channel.title: Delta stability
channel.description:
Hello,
I was wondering except from a good dedi, keeping the client.java small and removing code which isnt being used, what other ways are there of keeping a delta base very stable.
And if i were to make a delta based server very stable would it be to do with the player.java and the playerhandler.java.
Thank you for reading.
And i realise delta arent that stable. So no point in posting it.

item.title: Delta stability
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

pk george1:

Im pretty sure that i said i realise that delta based servers are not stable. Erm im asking for reasons in which i can make it more stable ? No need for what you just posted ?

There is no way to make delta stable. The only way you can decrease the instability is to remove thread-per-client, implement an event manager, imporve the loading/saving of players, and basically rework 89% of the inner mechanics of the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta stability
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Easiest way to have a stable server is to not use delta, and learn how to code servers the correct way.

Read full topic
